metadata.title: CVE-2021-33362 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stack buffer overflow in the hevc_parse_vps_extension function in MP4Box inGPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or executearbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
